attributes.action: review and overule the decisions made regarding former gurkhas and that they be given full british citizenship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a government become so detatched and out of touch with the electorate we are a country made up of people that has a sense of fair play and common decency,these BRAVE MEN,THESE WARRIORS,THESE GURKHAS have been treated disgracefully,I appeal to all those who have an ounce of common decency to sign this petition, thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
